mapper.insert: insert into V_HIS_PHYSICAL_DETAILED (PHYSICAL_DETAILED_ID, PHYSICAL_SUMMARY_ID, PHYSICAL_NUMBER, ITEM_CLASS_CODE, ITEM_CLASS_NAME, ITEM_CODE, ITEM_NAME, RESULT, UNIT, REFERENCE_RANGE, ABNORMAL, PHYSICAL_DETAILED_TIME) values (#{physicalDetailedId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{physicalSummaryId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{physicalNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{itemClassCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{itemClassName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{itemCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{itemName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{result,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{referenceRange,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{abnormal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{physicalDetailedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update V_HIS_PHYSICAL_DETAILED set PHYSICAL_SUMMARY_ID = #{physicalSummaryId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PHYSICAL_NUMBER = #{physicalNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ITEM_CLASS_CODE = #{itemClassCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ITEM_CLASS_NAME = #{itemClassName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ITEM_CODE = #{itemCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ITEM_NAME = #{itemName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESULT = #{result,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UNIT = #{unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REFERENCE_RANGE = #{referenceRange,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ABNORMAL = #{abnormal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PHYSICAL_DETAILED_TIME = #{physicalDetailedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where PHYSICAL_DETAILED_ID = #{physicalDetailedId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select PHYSICAL_DETAILED_ID, PHYSICAL_SUMMARY_ID, PHYSICAL_NUMBER, ITEM_CLASS_CODE, ITEM_CLASS_NAME, ITEM_CODE, ITEM_NAME, RESULT, UNIT, REFERENCE_RANGE, ABNORMAL, PHYSICAL_DETAILED_TIME from V_HIS_PHYSICAL_DETAILED where PHYSICAL_DETAILED_ID = #{physicalDetailedId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select PHYSICAL_DETAILED_ID, PHYSICAL_SUMMARY_ID, PHYSICAL_NUMBER, ITEM_CLASS_CODE, ITEM_CLASS_NAME, ITEM_CODE, ITEM_NAME, RESULT, UNIT, REFERENCE_RANGE, ABNORMAL, PHYSICAL_DETAILED_TIME from V_HIS_PHYSICAL_DETAILED
